texts.asteriskFieldsAreRequired: Fields marked with this character are mandatory:
texts.belowWelcomeToPlatform: In order to gain full access to our platform You first need to log-in. If You don't have account yet, then You can create one by clicking Register and by providing Your data. Once You finish the registration process You will receive an activation E-Mail.
texts.moreInformation: You can find more information about us: {here}
